name: 量化研究方法
description: This course aims at equipping students with the skills to use quantitative research methods that are adopted in educational research. The teaching contents include the data collection methods, survey research, experimental research, quasiexperimental research, design-based research, etc. Additionally, related research papers will be discussed to increase students’ understanding about the implementation of the introduced research methods in empirical studies.
goals: Develop students’ability to read articles related to research design in research on digital Chinese language teaching and learning
Enhance students’ ability to conduct research in digital Chinese language teaching through technologies
syllabus:
**1\. Introduction**

**2\. The nature of educational research**

**3\. Theresearch process: From proposal to finalreport**

**4\. Statistical techniques**

**5\. Selecting a sample**

**6\. Collecting research datawith tests andself-report measures**

**7\. Collecting research datawith questionnaire andinterviews**

**8\. Collectingresearch data with observation andcontent analysis**

**9 .Nonexperimental research:Descriptive andcausal-comparative designs**

**10.Nonexperimental research:Correlational designs**

**11.Experimental research:Designs, Part 1**

**12.Experimental research:Designs, Part 2**

**13.Experimentalresearch: Designs, Part 3**

**14\. Action research**

**15\. Design-based research design**

**16\. Evaluation research**

methodologies.note: To introduce the rationale of educational research and research designs

To divide students in small groups of 4 or 5 and proceed small group discussions on the implementation of
different research designs in empirical research
To have students present their discussion results

grading.note: Students should actively engage in in-class discussion and participate in the learning activities led by the instructor.
Each group should give oral presentations of their group discussion results
